alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 04 at 2:34PM MST until March 05 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches with locally higher amounts on ridgetops and above pass level. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...The Sun Valley region, Big Lost Highlands and Copper Basin * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills
